sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Stage from '../stage'
import { Graphics } from '../index'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"graphics"}}>{`Graphics`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.Graphics.html"}}>{`http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.Graphics.html`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"draw"}}>{`draw`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Draw graphics inline using the imperative `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`PIXI.Graphics`}</MDXTag>{` API.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="blockquote" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="blockquote">{`Use with caution, the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`draw`}</MDXTag>{` method is costly. If the component needs to update frequently
it might be better to use a cached texture instead.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="blockquote">{`Make sure to call `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`g.clear()`}</MDXTag>{` if you'd like to redraw the graphics.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"usage"}}>{`Usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={0} __code={`<Stage width={600} height={300} options={{ backgroundColor: 0xffffff }}>
  <Graphics
    draw={g => {
      // clear the graphics
      g.clear()
      // start drawing
      g.beginFill(0xff3300)
      g.lineStyle(4, 0xffd900, 1)

      g.moveTo(50, 50)
      g.lineTo(250, 50)
      g.lineTo(100, 100)
      g.lineTo(50, 50)
      g.endFill()

      g.lineStyle(2, 0x0000ff, 1)
      g.beginFill(0xff700b, 1)
      g.drawRect(50, 150, 120, 120)

      g.lineStyle(2, 0xff00ff, 1)
      g.beginFill(0xff00bb, 0.25)
      g.drawRoundedRect(150, 100, 300, 100, 15)
      g.endFill()

      g.lineStyle(0)
      g.beginFill(0xffff0b, 0.5)
      g.drawCircle(470, 90, 60)
      g.endFill()
    }}
  />
</Stage>`} __scope={{props,Stage,Graphics}}>
  <Stage width={600} height={300} options={{ backgroundColor: 0xffffff }}>
    <Graphics
      draw={g => {
        // clear the graphics
        g.clear()
    // start drawing
    g.beginFill(0xff3300)
    g.lineStyle(4, 0xffd900, 1)

    g.moveTo(50, 50)
    g.lineTo(250, 50)
    g.lineTo(100, 100)
    g.lineTo(50, 50)
    g.endFill()

    g.lineStyle(2, 0x0000ff, 1)
    g.beginFill(0xff700b, 1)
    g.drawRect(50, 150, 120, 120)

    g.lineStyle(2, 0xff00ff, 1)
    g.beginFill(0xff00bb, 0.25)
    g.drawRoundedRect(150, 100, 300, 100, 15)
    g.endFill()

    g.lineStyle(0)
    g.beginFill(0xffff0b, 0.5)
    g.drawCircle(470, 90, 60)
    g.endFill()
  }}
/>
  </Stage>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"example"}}>{`Example`}</MDXTag>
<iframe 
  height={500} 
  scrolling="no"
  title="Container" 
  src="//codepen.io/inlet/embed/d3b1be3b908b1d890442ee0c8baceaaf/?height=300&theme-id=33987&default-tab=result&embed-version=2"
  frameBorder="no" 
  allowtransparency="true"
  allowFullScreen="true"
  style={{ width: '100%' }} /></MDXTag>
